Attribute Long Name: Detector-board LED stimulation lamp powered on
Description: Flag for whether the detector-board LED stimulation lamp is on or off. Used for aliveness checks of the detector.

Attribute Long Name: Outside-detector-filter LED stimulation lamp powered on
Description: Flag for whether the LED that is outside the focal-plane filter is on or off. If the detector sees light that means that the filter is broken.
